project_abstract.cdata: The project would provide equipment and materials needed to construct about 4,500 circuit km of transmission lines operating at voltages above 66 kV, and about 110 substations with an aggregate capacity of about 3500 MVA. These are the lines and substations for which initial site preparation, line surveys, or preparation of bids are in progress in order to meet construction programs.
